MAN.TITLE: pvm_tidtohost
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: returns the host of the specified PVM process.

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : integer, task identifier of the PVM process in question.
: integer, the tid of the host's pvmd3 or a negative value if an error.

DESCRIPTION.P: pvm_tidtohost returns the host id on which the process identified by tid is running.
The returned value dtidwill be >= 0 if the call is successful and will be will be < 0 if some error occurs.
